byline.original: By SEWELL CHAN and RUSSELL GOLDMAN
byline.contributor: Sewell Chan reported from London, and Russell Goldman from New York.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Corbyn faced a revolt by fellow Labour lawmakers after Britain’s June 23 referendum to leave the European Union.

headline.print_headline: Labour Party Schedules Election With Unpopular Leader on Ballot
headline.main: Jeremy Corbyn Will Be on Ballot as Labour Party Schedules Election in Britain

snippet: Mr. Corbyn faced a revolt by fellow Labour lawmakers after Britain’s June 23 referendum to leave the European Union....
abstract: Britain's Labour Party agrees to hold election for its leadership and to guarantee embattled leader Jeremy Corbyn place on ballot; Corbyn has been criticized for tepid support for Britain remaining in European Union and has come under pressure to step down.
